name: The Bigger Picture (KevinWho)
description:
A new kind of puzzle game where you have to do stuff never explored before in the realm of puzzles, with a sarcastic scientist screaming at you. You ever wanted a puzzle that makes you think outside the box, no I mean really outside the box. Don't believe me that this is original, try it. Good Luck!


NOTE: THIS IS A DEMO FOR A FUTURE GAME MADE IN A GAME JAM, AS SUCH IT MAY BE BUGGY
